Miracles Not a Sure Evidence of God's Favor 

     The time is at hand when Satan will work miracles to confirm minds in the belief that he is God. All the people of God are now 
                                                                           15
to stand on the platform of truth as it has been given in the third angel's message. All the pleasant pictures, all the miracles wrought, will be presented in order that, if possible, the very elect shall be deceived. The only hope for anyone is to hold fast the evidences that have confirmed the truth in righteousness. Let these be proclaimed over and over again, until the close of this earth's history.--R.H., Aug. 9, 1906.
